title: Randomly suspeneded without e-mail or reason
body:
I am constantly berrated in game, i don't cuss out teammates, i ASK them to stop feeding/ play defensively and i am suspended?!
Didn't say how long, won'tl let me open client, no e-mail nothing.
I am sick of this harassment on riot's behalf..

replies.body:
Yes. Riot, out of tens of millions of players, has singled you, one player, out for harassment.

Or, more likely, your account was a victim of attempted hacking, and when you contact [Riot Support](https://support.riotgames.com) they will help you recover it. Or, there was an RP purchase on your account which was disputed and thus Riot banned your account until such time as you repay the balance. Or, your account was subject to a manual suspension for toxicity, and the client, for some reason, can't display the chat logs.

Regardless, contact support.

if you cannot open client, that is a technical issue, or you were a victim of hacking.

Get support bois regardless.

> [{quoted}](name=breakordoom444,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=EMJnRA7L,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-12-20T04:29:58.463+0000)
>
> if you cannot open client, that is a technical issue, or you were a victim of hacking.
> 
> Get support bois regardless.


Also regarding client, it is stuck in a loop of opening, patching, restarting, reverting patch, restarting, and now it's just stuck on an empty bar claiming to "update client" which isn't budging...
What is going on? I know this can't be happening only on my client...

Wow. Permabanned and in every game reported, the chat logs presented? Not one thing violating ToS.
This is pathetic. You guys claim an employee verifies and validates a permaban?
Not enough time nor can you honest to GOD claim to make this kind of decision based off of chatlog ALONE.
Without watching the game to see reference and understand what is going on with the conversation then you have NO IDEA, let alone, CAUSE to permaban.
This is sickening.
Your client being broken has nothing to do with a permban. Also, why on earth are you replying to yourself..
If you would like to share your chat logs, we can try to give you an idea on what probably caused this punishment. If you want a more definitive answer, do as Periscope said, and contact support

> [{quoted}](name=Modi,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=EMJnRA7L,comment-id=0001000000000001,timestamp=2018-12-20T04:56:04.593+0000)
>
> If you would like to share your chat logs, we can try to give you an idea on what probably caused this punishment. If you want a more definitive answer, do as Periscope said, and contact support

As much as I'd appreciate that, permaban will not be reversed no matter how hard I try.
I argued my case on my beta account that i spent YEARS and YEARS playing on. Grinding IP for multiple run pages (additional 13) multiple limited release skins, up to $3700 tanked for bogus reports and zero investigation.
Chatlogs should NEVER be the end-all be-all reason for a permban with no chance of reinstatement.
Trust me... I fought this reversal on my beta account for over 2 years to no avail

> Chatlogs should NEVER be the end-all be-all reason for a permban with no chance of reinstatement.

Then this is where we disagree. Poor behavior in chat, while it can have more intermediate steps between account in good standing and permanent ban, I agree with Riot in principle, poor chat behavior can, and should, lead to loss of your ability to access an account
How do you know you are permabanned, if you cannot login to League Client?

DW bro, this happened to me. During worlds I was banned and was not told anything. It turns out that I was using an Unauthorised credit card which they banned me and didn't want to explain how I did something I didn't do. I dont buy anything in any game it's a waste of money. Im still sad I didn't get my Kha'zix border :( thanks riot

If you can't open your client, the first thing you should do is run the Hextech Repair tool, it might be able to resolve the issue. Also, if you feel the account has been suspended in error you can contact Riot Support by submitting a support ticket. They might be able to shed some light. Good luck and I hope the issues get resolved.
......how do you know you're suspended if you can't open the client?
Haven't bought RP in years since asking teammaes who intentionally feed to stop feeding or play more defensive was considered reportable and now apparently bannable.

You know, it's hard to follow your conversations when you use discussion view and reply to yourself only. 

What we need right now is to see what it says when you log in. 

If you are stuck in the patching loop, you can try to do a hextech repair first. But typically you can still log in when the client is patching.

Anyway, since most people rather remain negative towards me and my circumstance, does anyone mind sending a message to my friend? I was booted from game during champ select.
His summoner name on NA server is "McApe" - can you tell him to send me a request on my new account..?
I'm now known as "McWhyBro" on NA
